casebody.data:
This case was not selected for publication in the Federal Reporter

Billy Roy TYLER, Appellant, v. HARRAH’S COUNCIL BLUFFS CASINO, Appellee. No. 05-3130. United States Court of Appeals, Eighth Circuit. Submitted: Dec. 7, 2006. Filed: Dec. 14, 2006. Billy Roy Tyler, Nebraska State Penitentiary, Lincoln, NE, pro se. Carla Heathershaw Risko, Fitzgerald & Schorr, Omaha, NE, for Appellee. Before MURPHY, BYE and MELLOY, Circuit Judges.

[UNPUBLISHED]

PER CURIAM.

Billy Roy Tyler appeals the district court’s1 adverse grant of summary judgment in his employment-discrimination suit. Having carefully reviewed the record, see Jacob-Mua v. Veneman, 289 F.3d 517, 520 (8th Cir.2002) (de novo standard of review), we conclude summary judgment was proper for the reasons the district court stated. Accordingly, we affirm. See 8th Cir. R. 47B.

. The Honorable Robert W. Pratt, Chief Judge, United States District Court for the Southern District of Iowa.
